org.rapla.mobile.android.widget.adapter

Class RaplaCategoryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • org.rapla.mobile.android.widget.adapter.RaplaCategoryAdapter

  • public class RaplaCategoryAdapter
extends
    The adapter binds a set of rapla categories to a list view. A list item consists of the category name and a checkbox which allows for selecting one category at a time.
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit
